title: Create a record
code:
const { error } = await supabase
  .from('countries')
  .insert({ id: 1, name: 'Mordor' })
data:
create table
countries (id int8 primary key, name text);

title: Create a record and return it
code:
const { data, error } = await supabase
  .from('countries')
  .insert({ id: 1, name: 'Mordor' })
  .select()
data:
create table
countries (id int8 primary key, name text);

title: Bulk create
data:
create table
countries (id int8 primary key, name text);
